QuestData.Title: Into the Dunes
QuestData.Description:
Whatever Rakera uncovered, it was important enough to earn her a death sentence to de sands.
We must head into Vol'dun to find her.
We cannot let whatever she knows about Jakra'zet die with her in de dunes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly into the deserts of Vol'dun and search for Warguard Rakera.
